issues.message: Member variable 'CSteamAPIContext::m_pSteamVideo' is not initialized in the constructor.
Rename class "_Acquire_ReturnProxy" to match the regular expression ^[A-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9]+$.
%u in format string (no. 4) requires 'unsigned int' but the argument type is 'signed int'.
Refactor this function to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 40 to the 15 allowed.
%u in format string (no. 3) requires 'unsigned int' but the argument type is 'signed int'.
Rename function "l" to match the regular expression ^[a-z_][a-z0-9_]{2,}$.
%u in format string (no. 2) requires 'unsigned int' but the argument type is 'signed int'.
Rename function "toBOOL" to match the regular expression ^[a-z_][a-z0-9_]{2,}$.
%u in format string (no. 1) requires 'unsigned int' but the argument type is 'signed int'.
Either merge this branch with the identical one on line "552" or change one of the implementations.
